header: It won’t be a white wedding, but…
text: …we’ll be glad to see you there.
This isn’t the wedding we initially envisioned, but it is the one we’ll cherish for the rest of our lives.

If you’re reading this, then you were selected from a handful of family and friends who mean the world to us. This will be an intimate affair on a mountaintop in Round Prairie, OR. We hope to see you there.
